titleStmt.title: Regi suo post bis septennium in patriam ex Angliâ redeunti, Scotiae gratulatio
titleStmt.author: Hume, David, 1560?-1630?

notesStmt.note: Dedication signed: David Humis (i.e. David Hume).
A poem written on the occasion of James I's return to Scotland.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
